item.title: trust30: Personal Message
item.description: To believe your own thought, to believe that what is true for you in your private heart is true for all men, that is genius. â€“ Ralph Waldo Emerson What is burning deep inside of you? If you could spread your personal message RIGHT NOW to 1 million people, what would you say? If I had the chance to share my personal message with anyone, it would always be the same.
